name: SQP Run
summary:
Take control of one of 8 unique characters and embark on a frantic race where speed and reflexes are king!

Your goal: cover as many meters as possible by skilfully avoiding obstacles in your way with the help of jumps and slides. As your score increases, the speed of the game accelerates, making each new challenge more intense.

If you're feeling cornered, quickly grab an energy drink for a life-saving burst of speed. But be careful, one wrong move and you're done!

Prove you're the fastest by checking the global leaderboard or challenging your friends directly. Who will be able to run farther than the others?

It's up to you to play the virtuosos of speed! A frenzied Runner where the pace is king and each new game is even more addictive. Ready to challenge your limits
